description: Updates information and words for a custom voice model.

parameters.name: customization_id
parameters.description: GUID of the custom voice model to be updated. You must make the request with service credentials created for the instance of the service that owns the custom model.

parameters.name: words
parameters.description: List of words and their translations to be added to or updated in the custom voice model. Pass an empty array to make no additions or updates.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: New name for the custom voice model.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: New description for the custom voice model.
